q: : The winner of X Factor will be awarded$ 5 million record deal, the largest guaranteed prize in TV history. Simon Cowell also says he's glad that audiences are still interested in talent competitions. The good news is people are still excited about these shows- Idol, Dancing with the Stars, America's Got Talent- people, thank god, still like these shows and that gives me confidence for when we launch ours[ in the fall].

"I want to pay back the shyster loans," Sergio Marchionne said at an industry conference, using a derogatory term for an unprincipled lawyer or politician. Pay back the loans, get those out and then take( the company) public.) which owns 25 percent of Chrysler, has said repeatedly that the high interest rates on$ 5.7 billion that Chrysler owes to the U.S. Treasury have been an obstacle in the automaker's return to profitability.
